BrassMonkey.name: BrassMonkey

Device.name: Device
Device.description:
Each connected device is represented by an instance of this class. 

Communicating with a particular device is done through this class' methods.

DeviceAvailableEvent.name: DeviceAvailableEvent
DeviceAvailableEvent.description:
Event called when a mobile device first establishes a connection. 

**Note:**

DeviceConnectedEvent.name: DeviceConnectedEvent
DeviceConnectedEvent.description: Event called when a mobile device successfully established a connection.

DeviceDisconnectedEvent.name: DeviceDisconnectedEvent
DeviceDisconnectedEvent.description: Event called when a mobile device is disconnected.

ShowSlotColorEvent.name: ShowSlotColorEvent
ShowSlotColorEvent.description:
Event called when the SDK has received it's assigned slot index/color.

This is the unique color that is displayed in top right of the console, in your game, and 
on the device list in the controller app. It's used to help users disambiguate which
console/game they want to connect to, if there is more than one on your network.

props.name: name
props.description:
The name of your game. This is what 
    is displayed on the phone when you pick what to connect to.
    
    Example: "Monkey Golf"

props.name: appID
props.description:
The unique identifier of your Game/App. You
    must generate this through the developer admin interface.

props.name: maxPlayers
props.description: The number of players that can play your game.

props.name: swfURL
props.description:
The location of the SWF file that implements 
    the SDK when there a browser doesn't support Websockets. 
    
    If not provided the matching version on the Brass Monkey CDN is used.

classitems.description: Event called when a mobile device successfully established a connection.
classitems.name: deviceavailable

classitems.description: Event called when a mobile device successfully established a connection.
classitems.name: deviceconnected

classitems.description: Event called when a mobile device is disconnected.
classitems.name: devicedisconnected

classitems.description: Event called when a mobile device is disconnected.
classitems.name: devicedisconnected

classitems.description:
Version number of the SDK. 

Format:

    Major.Minor.Patch

Example:

    "0.5.1"
    
Follows the [Semantic Versioning Specification.](http://semver.org)
classitems.name: version

classitems.description:
Display name of the user associated with this device.

If the user is logged in on their device this will be their profile name, otherwise it will be the name they gave their device.
classitems.name: name

classitems.description: The unique identifier of this device.
classitems.name: id

classitems.description:
Enable/Disable touch events.

Touch events are off by default to reduce network traffic and should only be enabled if you are doing touch based controls.
classitems.name: enableTouch

params.name: enable
params.description: If 'true' touches are enabled, if 'false' touches are disabled.

params.name: frequency
params.description: Frequency at which touch events are gathered and sent from the device. (Milliseconds)

classitems.description:
Enable/Disable accelerometer events.

Accelerometer events are off by default to reduce network traffic and should only be enabled if you are doing touch based controls.
classitems.name: enableAccelerometer

params.name: enable
params.description: If 'true' touches are enabled, if 'false' touches are disabled.

params.name: frequency
params.description: Frequency at which touch events are gathered and sent from the device. (Milliseconds)

classitems.description: Set which controller mode the device is in.
classitems.name: setMode

params.name: mode
params.description:
Which mode do you want to set?

  **"gamepad"** Show your custom controller layout.
  
  **"keyboard"** Show the built in keyboard input layout.
  
  **"navigation"** Show the built in navigation input layout.

  **"wait"** Show the waiting/loading screen.

classitems.description: Get which controller mode the device is in.
classitems.name: getMode

classitems.description: Unique identifier to your network. (Each instance of Brass Monkey running get it's own slotIndex number)
classitems.name: slotIndex

classitems.description:
Color to display on the screen. (CSS Style Hexidecimal)

Example:

    "#ff0000"
classitems.name: color
